message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're starting high, I'm willing to meet you halfway
I'll meet you halfway, but I'm still hoping for a better deal
You're getting closer, but I'm still not there
I'm willing to give a bit more, but I'm still hoping for a better split
Getting close, but I'm still not giving up
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up yet
